body:
Comment 2: 
I am not sure how well specified this is.

I agree that the program should work but I'm not sure the
spec says it should.  My own understanding (and the
implementation) of unexported names has been that it is
as if lower case names are invisibly annotated with the
package they came from, so that the name private from
package hiding is different from the name private from
package main.

The bug is because the compiler screwed up, but I would
like to make sure that the spec allows this program too.
